name: Tune Knight
desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can treat this card as a Tuner this turn, also for the rest of this turn, you can only Special Summon from the Extra Deck once. Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.
